resources.string: Create new account
Account name - characters (A–Z) digits (1–5)
Account name

Resources are required to create an account on the EOS blockchain, as such there is a small cost to create an account. We will generate a local private key, create an account, and assign your public key as its owner. Your private key is RSA encrypted using a key stored in the AndroidKeyStore, it will never leave this device.
Your account has been created.
The private key below was added as both the active and owner permission of your new account. Please backup this private key somewhere in the physical world and avoid storing it digitally.
Create Account (%s)
Done
Our create account feature is currently unavailable, you can still use this app by importing an existing private key.
We could not connect to Google play, please check your internet connection and try again.
You cancelled the Google play purchase, you can alternatively import an existing private key if you do not want to pay our fee.
Our account issuing service is currently frozen. You can use the app by importing an existing private key, we apologies for any inconvenience.
Google play could not process your payment, please check your internet connection and try again.

You have already purchased an account, but unfortunately an issue occurred while processing your transaction. You will have received an email confirmation containing your purchaseId, please contact support@memtrip.com quoting this purchaseId. We will resolve this for you ASAP.
Please enter an account name that is 12 characters in length.
We could not create an account at this time, please check your connection and try again.

We could not create an account at this time, please check your connection and try again. If you continue to encounter difficulties, please contact support@memtrip.com and quote your purchase id. A list of your purchase ids can be found in settings -> transaction history.
The account name you chose already exists, please choose another name.
Could not import key

We could not import private key, please check your internet connection and try again. If you continue to encounter difficulties, please clear your app data and import the private key that you just backed up.

We could not find your recently created account, it can take some time for these changes to propagate through the EOS network. Please wait a few minutes and try again. If you continue to encounter difficulties, please change the EOS endpoint URL in settings and import the private key that you just backed up.
Import existing key
The private key you enter will be RSA encrypted, it will never leave this device. If you have trust issues (we don\'t blame you), build this app from source.
View source on github
https://github.com/memtrip/eosreach
Private key
Import
Could not import private key, please check your connection and try again.
Invalid private key format.
We did not find any accounts associated with this private key, the Create Account option is the easiest way to get started. If this is unexpected, try changing the EOS endpoint in settings.
You have already imported this private key, sync your accounts to update the details for this key.
